H0.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. British Virgin Islands

H1.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. Puerto Rico

H2.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. Danish Caribbean

H3.text: As what are the islands previously known as the Danish West Indies now known. USVI

A4.text: They were sold to the United States by Denmark for $25,000,000 in the 1917 Treaty of the Danish West Indies ($614 million in 2024) in which the United States also recognized Denmark's control over Greenland, and have since been an organized, unincorporated United States territory.

A5.text: They were sold to the United States by Denmark for $25,000,000 in the 1917 Treaty of the Danish West Indies.
